author: newsr.in
title: One Direction Announce New Single 'Perfect' - See The Artwork Here!
text: One Direction just announced their new single, “Perfect”! The guys — Harry Styles, Liam Payne, Louis Tomlinson and Niall Horan — dropped the news after their concert in Glasgow, Scotland on Thursday (October 8). “Our next single is called ‘Perfect’. Looking forward to you hearing it, hope that you like those apples,” Harry wrote on [...] »
